definition: flower of north India (Datura stramonium, Sanskrit: mandara), considered sacred and grown in temples, similar to belladonna

sentences.english: Production of Arbutin through Biotransformation of Exogenous Hydroquinone by Datura stramonium Cell Suspension Cultures;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究白花曼陀羅細胞懸浮培養合成生物鹼。

sentences.english: Recently, we found this phenomenon also occurred in jimsonweed.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我們又在曼陀羅中看到這個現象。

sentences.english: Where is the mandala most likely to be found?
sentences.chinese: 在哪裏最有可能找到曼陀羅？

sentences.english: A systematic and pharmacognostical study on five species of Datura in China.
sentences.chinese: 五種曼陀羅的植物分類及中藥鑑定研究。

sentences.english: G was adopted to determine toxicity of Datura stramonium .
sentences.chinese: 採用灌胃法測定曼陀羅對小鼠的毒性。

sentences.english: At a conference on mandala making.
sentences.chinese: 如何製造曼陀羅的會議。

sentences.english: This tea, have mandalas technique work precision bouquet, born of tea.
sentences.chinese: 此茶做工手法精密，有曼陀羅花香味，生茶。

sentences.english: The basic element of the mandala is the circle.
sentences.chinese: 曼陀羅的基本元素便是圓。

sentences.english: The focus of the mandala symbolizes the center of energy.
sentences.chinese: 曼陀羅的中心點象徵着能量的中心。

sentences.english: Later I learned that it was a tree called datura which I had so often read about in books.
sentences.chinese: 後來我才知道這就是我在書上讀到那麼多次的曼陀羅。

sentences.english: Mandalas originated in India, but were mainly used in Tibetian Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 曼陀羅源於印度，但主要用於藏傳佛教。

sentences.english: To investigate the biotransformation of hydroquinone by cell suspension cultures of Datura stramonium.
sentences.chinese: 研究了白花曼陀羅細胞懸浮培養對外源氫醌的糖基化。

sentences.english: Later I learned that it was a tree called datura which I had so often read about in hooks.
sentences.chinese: 後來我才清楚這就是我在書上讀到那麼多次的曼陀羅。

definition: to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
